data.text: It used to work fine. I check my transactions, schedule payments, and book travel all the time. Recently the app became inoperable, stuck at the logo, a circle just spins and spins, and will not go to the logon page (i'm using fingerprint login, if that matters) I've reinstalled, and tried everything, it still is unusable. Others reported the same problem. Please fix the damn app. I'm seriously thinking of closing the credit card account. It's just too inconvenient to log on from browser.

Loved the app when I first got it, I usually check it like every day. But lately every time I open it it just stays on the very first opening page for 5, 10 minutes, and never loads. Every. Single. Time. I've tried restarting it. Restarting my phone, switching between wifi and data. Nothing works it just stays on that screen the whole time.

The app was perfectly fine up until this most recent update. Now you can't even use the app, it doesn't even go past the loading screen. It just spins and spins and spins. Ive restarted my phone, uninstalled and reinstalled the app, and still nothing. Expect us to pay our card bills on time but can't even get the app to load anymore. Thanks for breaking and ruining the app!

You changed it. I don't like change. Edit: It's been awhile, I've added 2 more cards, and have gotten used to the app, therefore have increased my rating by 2 stars. nothing I would change. out of all my credit card/ banking apps,this Capital One is 100% the best. So easy to use and absolutely love the home page upon opening I can see my cards and balances very clearly! Good job, Capital One!

I have always found this app really useful but since the last update I can barely open it. I live in a place with slower internet and it could be that the be version is so data heavy I can't use it here, but it is just stuck on the opening page with the logo or just the circle and never opens. But it always worked perfectly before. It seems like other people are also having this issue in the land of good internet. Hoping it can be fixed soon!!

Ever since the update I can't get in the app. It just spins and load randomly but not when I actually need it. Fix it!!! It is not March 10th and I still have issues with the app actually working. Will not raise stars until this is fixed, I am not the only one having issues since the 2/23 update. Fix it!! You can easily reverse the update so we can use our apps.

Not as convenient as I'd initially hoped right off the bat, but support was extremely helpful and caring when it came to my concerns. It was easy to get pointed in the right direction when contacting them and all of my issues were addressed promptly. I look forward to using this app and to see what it has to offer me in my town. Once I got things up and running my confidence in this bank grew along with my portfolio. Happy to see it ðŸŒž

Not recommended for any good credit people and for those who expect a high end credit card. They give very small credit limit, which is good for buying ðŸ¥œ peanuts, They don't do automatic increase also. So i just use it little bit to keep it live. I can't even buy 2 persons international airtickets with my 3k $card limit, which would cost more than 4k $ min. I would not recommend it for anyone with good credit & pay their bills on time every month. NO, NO, NO

Love the app...it does exactly what it's supposed to do. Recently though users are unable to enter a cents amount when making payments ( which can lead to a lingering remaining balance). I also enjoyed the real-time credit availability adjustments when a payment is made...but that feature is no longer. If those issues are fixed 4 or 5 stars

One of the best banks I've used. All digital, no banks to go to just Walgreens and CVS (in Florida) and I can deposit cash with clerks. I had my car and credit cards through them and they are good for repayments, no overdrafts if you want that setting, allow you to pay back slowly if you communicate and waive fees if you ask. But all around great bank no problems

Update: the bug where the app launches every time I unlock my phone is fixed, but when I opened the app recently, the language was set to Spanish. My phone's language is still set to English so not sure how that happened. I have always found the app easy to use. But after the most recent update, it now launches every time I unlock my phone screen. It's pretty irritating.

This app is unfortunately a disaster. In the early days, I had no issues logging in, but as of late I can't even make it to the log in screen. It's always in an endless loading loop. I tried every trick in the book to try to address it, but after reading the comments here and online, I've come to realize that this is not unique to me; it is definitely a Capital One issue. Sadly, the folks at Capital One are doing an excellent job of ignoring to their customers' complaints.

This app will not open. I get a screen with the logo and the loading circle spinning. Reseting the phone, uninstalling, and reinstalling the app did not help. Clearing the cache did not help. Updating the app did not help. It seems to only make it to the log-in screen at random times, and never when it's convenient.

I like the app and the functionality of it is pretty decent. I have had issues with it crashing and I don't like that they took away that you can no longer swipe left or right between accounts. On top of that, the app now opens at random and it's a major inconvenience, had it not been for this I'd rate it a 4 out a 5 but the random opening is just too inconvenient. Please fix it.

Over all I find the app easy to use and it WAS very convenient. But for the last couple of weeks or so it suddenly starts the app every time I unlock my phone, and randomly through out the day. I cannot find any permissions in my phone that would allow this to happen. This is getting REALLY annoying, and as much as I do use it I am seriously considering deleting it.

Overall functionality is decent does what it needs to do. There isn't a robust security feature for logging in - only password or finger print. There should be a 2FA opt in option. There also should be a way to give feedback in the app. Credit card bill pay has messed up recently. It gives a message stating your available balance has been updated when you have a payment pending. It doesn't get updated until your payment goes through. A few months ago, this worked correctly, but not anymore.

Something is trying to start this app up without me asking about 30 times an hour. At first, it was just giving "phantom" notifications and I didn't know which app was doing it, but now the splash screen appears with them. Pausing it for the day in Android still makes a message come up each time telling me that the app is paused. I'm probably going to have to delete it, and this is my primary credit card company. Pretty bummed about whoever caused this and allowed it out in the wild.

Pretty bad... when I make a payment, it takes the app to process the payment one or one and a half days to upgrade my available credit.... and, at the begining, it was almost instantly. I paid the whole balance this morning (8 am) and its 4:31 pm and it's still showing the old balance. Really disappointed.

In the last 1 week, 2nd week of February 2024, the mobile phone app continues to pop up on the load screen without me touching or opening the app. The loading screen continues to pop up sporadically about 10 to 30 times per hour, flashing across my phone screen. I have to exit the app each time, and the app continues to load on its own without my consent! This is absurd. Even deleting or uninstalling the app won't fix the bug. Update this ASAP.

I wouldn't recommend capital one to anyone. Their services are garbage. I activated a card through the app and within 2 months had to deal with fraud on it. Only card I've had that issue with. App is also cumbersome and they asks for too many permissions to ever want to use. I have to reactivate and use it after only 2 years of inactivity, and it's a headache. The limit I'd only $300... DO NOT GO WITH THIS APP OR COMPANY

For some reason the app keeps launching every time I unlock my phone. Like. Every. Single. Time. It's incredibly annoying as it launches over whatever app I'm actually trying to open. This has been happening for days now so I finally tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Still an issue. As I see in other reviews I'm not the only one having this issue I know it's not my phone.

Slow loading but it's pretty secure I guess. I haven't had any problems with it so far. It'd be nice if when they say your credit has been updated after a payment, it actually showed the updated credit. Pretty smooth app with everything you could want for banking or just for your credit cards either way. Virtual cards are great as well, another level of security.

I've used Capital 0ne for several years and happy with their service. The app works really well and handy to check balance. Only issue I've ever had is when there is an update available and trying to check my balance. Usually I'll wait a half day after updating as sometimes the app will not allow me to access my account immediately after updating.

The things I need to get to on the app (making payment, transaction history) are easy to find, though tbh transaction history could be easier, but it bugs me that capitalone shoves offers in my face every time I try to make a payment and won't let me say "no". Instead, it's "maybe later", which is frustrating and makes me less charitable to the app.

Pros: APY: You mentioned enjoying the high 5% APY, which is significantly higher than the national average. Multiple accounts flexibility: You appreciate the option to open multiple savings and checking accounts for better organization. Cons: Slow transfer times: Delays of a week or two for transfers between banks can be inconvenient. Redundant balance information: Having separate "current" and "available" amounts can be confusing and create misleading impressions of your actual balance.

STOP FREEZING ME OUT OF MY DAMN ACCOUNT App is non functional. Tells me my password was entered too many times, first time logging in everytime. When I change it as prompted, the cycle starts all over again. I cannot log in at all anymore. My password is correct. What is the point to an app if you don't let users actually log in? It makes no sense. Please fix this bug. Ridiculous and frustrating.

This app used to be amazing. Now it opens up automatically several times a day!!!! Any time my phone goes to sleep, or if I have to unlock the screen, or sometimes I've even been in the middle of looking at something, and up pops Capital One Mobile for ZERO reason. I've seen other reviews where the same thing is happening to other users. I've noticed this has been since your last update, and I don't understand why this hasn't been addressed. I'm almost to the point of uninstalling it!

It needs to not have so much information crammed together. It needs to be spaced apart where it's easier to understand. It needs to be more detailed and organized on the options to choose. Where it tells you the amount of credit you owe and the amount available underneath that It's crammed together. The site really needs to be redone. Thanks for allowing my opinion.

Can only give 3 stars at this time because I haven't had the opportunity to use the app very much. As far as approval process, it was simple and fairly quick. ( COM)...App was also easy and quick to install and set up accoun Waiting for card to come on mail now. When opening this card I was in the impression that I would be able to use a virtual card in replace of the physical card, and that has proven to be untrue thus far, but that may be a problem with the lender vs the actual app it's self.

Used to have a higher rating. I am fed up with Pop Up Ads inside my credit/ banking app while trying to access my accounts. Whenever I open the app or switch between accounts I get advertisements for other Capital One products. The Ads take up the entire screen until you accept or reject them. This is an app that should be a service to customers for accessing accounts, not another way for them to inundate you with more obnoxious Pop Up Ads.

The company itself I'm not having issues with, it's the app. I just clicked on a link in the Capital One Mobile app to go and save on some stuff with the Capitol One coupons they provide in app, however once it opened my browser it then opened under 200 pages , I think the actual number was 186. Either way, super sus for doing that, especially when I had to go in and force close the browser just to get a fighting chance at stopping it.

Can't use feedback on the app so posting here. Recent update has ruined billpay. Way too many clicks at every step. What should be simple or default choice requires multiple clicks. Payment date has been changed to Send date and there is no information about payee electronic bill payment capability or delivery time, so you have to guess about when to send the payment. I have had late payments as a result. Almost bad enough to move money to another bank.

This bank stops you from making payments until after the payment is due. You get hit with interest no matter how you try to pay off your bill. They have never works you cannot get it to accept new payments. It took over a year of requesting by Bill date be change before they finally did it so they could collect and charge me late fees. It's a total rip off.

FOUND A FIX FOR RANDOM APP POP UPS, watching what the phone was doing when I unlocked it, the app is triggering location. After toying around, found out that turning off location, turn on airplane mode and hard reset phone. Turn airplane mode off and location back on. No issues with random app open for a whole day now Edit- turn off touchless payment as well (NFC)

Decent card but Ilothers with better features. A step back from what it used to be. They are phasing out debit card payments, but payments still instantly reflect on balance. They got rid of chatting with a live person. You have to talk to a supervisor to get an off-cycle reporting or rapid re-score, if it's submitted correctly at all. Everyone has heard about the difficulties get limit increases. You used to be able to request APR change online. Upgrading cards only changes the features

l thought it was great when l first got it, it showed all my accounts with snapshots of information and allowed me tp go to each with just a touch. For the past two weeks it takes minutes to load, l've restarted my phone, cleared my cache, uninstalled and re installed it and still the same issue, it's so bad that l have to go to the website now. l've had my phone checked and it's not my phone that's the problem and when l check to see if they've got system issues it just says everything is fine

Normally I like this app and use it to check my balances and pay my cards off, but lately something has changed to where it starts trying to open the app on its own for no reason at all while I'm on the middle of doing other things on my phone... it just did it right now after I typed that sentence!!! It does it on my wife's phone too and I see another review here that says the same thing. They really need to fix whatever it causing that and I would re-rate it at 4 or 5 stars.

ALMOST a good app. Too bad you can't pay full amount owed, but they are trying hard to charge you interest - so anything they can do to delay you paying..... Now they are finally removing the preview - after spending a couple years trying to make it work. They get it fixed to work correctly, and discontinue it after a couple months. Go figure..

Had update today 2/3/24 & I don't know what happened but now the app just opens up on its own when I am doing something else. Notifications are turned off. There is no reason this app should be just popping up with the log in screen. Only started today after the update. Please fix it. And please bring back the old way of just swiping left or right. Update 2/20/24 and the app still opens on its own for no reason when I am doing something else. PLEASE FIX IT!!!!

9/29/23, very slow to update balances. Zero updates Friday afternoon through Monday morning. Fingerprint sign in worked for a few weeks, now it does not. Preview screen also worked for a short time after introduction, now it is just an extra screen to get past to sign in to view the limited information that might or might not be available. 2/6/24, took away one more star as above issues have not been addressed in the slightest.

The app is easy to navigate, but when trying to apply for a virtual card, the app will glitch out, or when it comes to verifying my identity through my phone number, it says, "We hit a snag. Please try again later." I have tried for 2 days with no luck. I have tried to verify with ID, but it will not accept my DL, passport, or government ID.....the system is broken in that regard and needs to be fixed or another way to contact someone or a means to be able to email about the issues.

Sucks. Asks me to log in over and over. Unable to add card to Google wallet because app won't allow it. Asks you to validate your self using drivers lisnece but app cannot capture the picture properly. Lots of bugs and annoying to use. Had to call just to activate my card after spending 40 minutes trying on the app just for it to shut down.

Used to LOVE this app, now I can't stand it and looks like I need to uninstall it now too. My app like the others have also experienced the opening of the app at any chance it gets on its own, several times a day while on the phone doing something else. Please fix the update asap, its been going on for over a week now and I thought this may have been temporary!

I have downloaded this app to pay capital one bills and I've had to reset my password twice now and everytime I go out and try to log back in later it says it dosent recognize my sign in! Now trying a third time to reset my password and it's locked me out of accounts!! No where on the app is there a email address to contact them! So much for convenient online bill management!

I find it to be very useful with lots of information and abilities to see and control account information. It does have "notifications" for features which if its something one does not want to use they continue to appear every time the app is opened. Overall I think it is a very useful app.

Overall this is great app! My favorite feature is the real time alerts. With all the fraud going on you can get instant text and/or emails when a transaction is made under your cards. The only thing I wish and this goes for all credit card companies was balances and credit limits after each transaction. Some of us want to make sure we know why our balance is what it is and can pinpoint from ledgers.

Absolutely the best. App did everything it said it would without ANY hiccups, or having to redo anything. Have always been a little leery with mobile apps but this is even better than the one I use on my pc. So easy to use, not any of those "extra" steps to get something done! Just a couple of clicks and WOW I was done!! I was changing a auto payment amount and thought it would take forever...surprise, just a couple of clicks and done..easy, simple and a breeze.

App is fairly good. I like Capital One as a credit card company, it's the best I have found so far. The app is easy to use, but as with most finance/business apps, the features that you can access on mobile are limited. You can access maybe only 30% of the features available to you on the online website. Creditwise now always has an update notification even when there is no update, this needs to be fixed. There are also a ton of pop-up "offers" that you have to constantly close. Annoying.

I have spent one and a half hours trying to take a picture of a check for deposit. While the pictures, all 76 of them are crystal clear, front and back! I even Uninstaller the app and reinstalled it. I've taken pictures from every angle. When I called customer service and fought with the frickin "automated" phone "assistant", the guy says "oh yeah, it's just trial and error ha-ha. I now have a useless piece of paper that used to be a check! Yea! Very funny indeed!

It works fine for paying the bill and seeing the transactions, but there are way too many ads, I find it very annoying. It would also be nice if you could manage more if the security features through the app like confirming if suspicious purchases were you or not. Please turn off all the solicition. It's like junk mail I can't throw away.

App is ok, but the way capital one does business is so iffy. Did a dispute on credit card. They gave me temporary credit. I saw on available balance. Then when I went to use it, declined. Called in and they were saying that they have to do investigation first. That it's just credit for statement. But I recieve digital letter about the credit and even saw it available. Flip the script so fast, it's like why even say or even give anything then take it away without explanation. Corporations!!

There's a bunch of stuff you can't do with this app like even dispute a transaction or turn on/off your card- it makes you go online w a computer. It's really annoying. Customer service is also so much better elsewhere they're making me wait for a snail mail response to a disputed transaction. With my visa it was a phone call and it was all done. I'm going to get a different card.

Would rate 4.5 if I could. Only minor issues with the app, like they had a function where you could swipe between accounts but they took that away. Only other gripe is the log off should just have a button on the main page instead of going into a menu that you can fat finger and go to the account settings page instead of just logging off. Good app, just needs some tweaks.

When I have the Capital One App open on my Android phone, and I switch between applications, it always shows my bank account balances. Is there a way to not show the balances? Sometimes you pass your phone to a friend or relative to look at a photo and they accidentally click the Apps button (|||) on the bottom of the screen - they can then see your bank balances because the Capital One App displays them clearly. For security purposes, it should be blank or just a logo.

I am using the capital one booking system and my experience has not been great. I booked a flight with a new Venture x card and 3 days after booking the flight I got an email saying they canceled my trip. Of course by then the flights had increased their price considerably. I see no direct way to contact customer service about it. In summary, the booking service is unreliable, would not recomend for serious travelers.

It's been a great app til yesterday. Been with the bank for and have had the app for at least 7 years. Now the app won't open at all. Shuts down and later sends a feedback and close app options screen. Two days almost. Update: it's been a few years since my last review. I love the app and the convenience of immediate transfers and deposits, most cases. It's very convenient now. Thank you.

App works, but it's really slow compared to other credit card apps, perhaps due to extra stuff like product offers that I don't find necessary. I'd also appreciate a dashboard that shows at the top when my next closing date is. It's hard to find in the app, and really important to know when you have a low credit limit. It occasionally has issues that require me to uninstall and reinstall the app, which hasn't happened nearly as frequently with other financial apps.

Very helpful app! You see everything at a glance. Although it would be helpful if we could make payment arrangements within the app. It would be nice if we could see more transations without downloading a statement. Other than that, the app is safe and easy to maneuver within it It sucks that Capital One remives the ability to pay bills with debit cards. :(

Had to update. Did so. Couldn't sign in. Error message: If you're having problems, uninstall and reinstall the app. Did so. Now, the app "can't" work without these permissions allowed: location, storage, contacts. None of those should be required for this app. I've used Cap One and this app for 4 years while never allowing those permissions. They were good. They've worsened since then, but I kept using them because the app was convenient. Now, I can't wait to get rid of them.

I've seen this complaint from others, however I would like to add to it. For the past few days everytime I unlock my phone, this app pops up. I've tried EVERYTHING to stop it. From disabling permissions, notifications and Uninstalling. It's extremely frustrating and could be a safety issues as well, not to sound dramatic. Please Please fix this. Thanks!

I've been using this app for about a year now, and I have never had any problems with it. It's very convenient to check your balance and available credit, look at past statements, view rewards, look at your credit score on CreditWise, view your minimum due date, and other options on the app. Lastly, whenever I make a payment, usually I get my credit instantly, even though it takes a few days to clear my bank account.

The app is good for managing your account, however, it's disappointing that the app can advertise to me a half dozen times a week about some "great" things to buy, but instead of telling me I had a payment due, it waited a week to let me know the payment is late. I've paid my bill on time or early for years. Never has regular payment been reported to the credit bureaus but the ONE late payment was reported 5 minutes after midnight the date the payment was supposed to be due. Very disappointed.

Don't trust this app or company, make sure you pay attention to when your payments are due and don't rely on the notification system, and don't trust that they'll call or notify you if you miss a payment either, I set it to notify me by text 5 days before a payment is due and recieved no notifications for 3 months (I'd also thought all my cards were set to autopay, but apparently it didn't work) they just kept tacking on late fees. They waived a single late fee, when their software was faulty.

The app is great, the company, not so much. Been a loyal customer for years and I dont think I've ever missed a payment. However I've never had my credit limit raised , not even once. Have several other cards that I HAVE missed payments on before and even they've increased my limit (some cases more than once). Whatever that process is, maybe should take into consideration credit history with YOUR company and not so much the general credit history, just a thought.

The app recently started to open by itself when I unlock the phone. This issue has been ongoing for the last two days. I looked it up, and it's stated that turning off the NFC payment feature resolves. However, I use that feature all the time. Sometimes, the app opens several times while using the device, no matter how many times I close it. This really is frustrating.

One gripe about this app. No "preferred" setting for payments. If you have a checking and savings account, the savings account will default to the payment source. I have thought I was paying bills but didn't notice it was set to savings were I had little money...I of course was charged late fees even though I had money in my checking to cover the bill and thought believed that it has been done. Oops! Frequenct updates are also frequently inconvenient when I need to access my account now...but..

This app would get 5 stars if not for the aggravation that comes when signing in! Every single time I go to sign in it tells me they locked my account because the wrong username was entered too many times, forces me to change my password, enter my name, ssn, date of birth & then sends a verification code for me to enter. I can try to log in seconds apart & this happens everytime, so there are no attempts being made w/the wrong username. Plus everytime I turn on, remember username, it's off!

As a credit card customer I really like this app, as a banking customer, this app is disappointing. I do not get notified of deposits made to this account, it's not an option in the app. I can only get notifications about debits, which is great but deposits/credits are just as important. As a credit card customer I used to get notified when a credit hit my account (e.g. a purchase return) that doesn't happen anymore. The app moves a lot slower even for fingerprint recognition

Needs many fixes. Every time I try to login with fingerprint as of the latest update, I am prompted with a popular saying "An internal error has occurred, please try again" and it never works. Additionally, when attempting to view my transactions for a given bank account, it crashes the app. This is for every phone I have, not just this device. Edit: Thank you, Capital One, for fixing the app. It now is flawlessly working and smooth at that. Well done!

review downgrade, app would not read. Check and Chase app would Best best banking app that I have used for people who are blind or low vision. There are still a few minor things that could be smooth out, but overall it is the best. Great online banking and very secure. I would recommend it to anyone who wants a online banking account with no crazy fees. I also get a very good interest rate on my savings account. Just make sure to ask for the one with the best interest rate.

If a zelle transaction "pending" or "still processing" do not show that transaction as "money received". That is the dumbest thing I've ever seen on this app. Also, if an outgoing transaction is "still pending" do not show that same transaction as having been "cleared". It's just as dumb and it causes a lot of confusion to the customer. You need to upgrade your app to reflect the same information that YOUR system shows.

I really appreciate the app and its functionality. However, the frequent pop-ups requesting the use of the Capital One browser extension to complete online purchases can be frustrating, especially when it keeps appearing even after being declined. I believe that if this issue is addressed, it would greatly improve the overall user experience of the app and deserve the five star rating.

I'm so tired of constantly needing to verify by SMS, even multiple times per session, due up being abroad. What's the point of a travel card that you can't effectively travel with? What's the point of biometric verification? Why not use 2FA apps instead? No other card provider that I have does this. I can't even populate a virtual card, one of the supposed best features of Cap1, and support is clueless about fixing it.

This app is unreliable for bill pay. If I can give zero stars I would. They take the money out of my account and two weeks later my bill still has not been paid. This happened with 3 of my vendors and I was late on all. The level of customer service was horrible. I have been using chase and think they are much better for all banking needs in general.

Updated 10/14/23: This has been one of the best banking apps since the issue (see original review) was long resolved. Using it with both Apple and Androud systems across multiple devices without any problems. Original review 06/16/21: One star due to Transactions ("See all transactions") option no longer being available. That was one of the most useful features of the app.

Thanks for automatically denying my auto payment to my virus protection. Got charged to my backup bank account and was hit with a insufficient funds charge the day before payday. Really appreciate it. I pay it with this to avoid the unexpected bank charge, and in one instant, you wiped that out. Seems like after 10 years, you would let it go through.

A year after my 1 star review, things have NOT changed with the Zelle function. Can't send money with Zelle and get the "we hit a snag message" randomly. App doesn't show contacts and just keeps searching when you try to manually put in a number. Also would be nice if you could return/refund a payment directly to the person who sent you money without needing to input and save them as a contact

Frustrated I typically love this app but recently it has been opening every time that I unlock my phone and it's become very frustrating. I've tried just about anything and everything to make this not happen, but there is nothing that I have found that works. Even if I pause the app, it's still pops up at the bottom of my screen. Very frustrated, please fix this soon.

Love the capital one app but I'm really disappointed they did away with sure swipe. That was the one thing that.made it easier and faster to long in then having to type in a password every time. I don't log in as often as I should because of the change in log in. I would give 5 stars if it was easier to log in because I like the organization and quality of the app. It's very easy to use compared to some of my other credit card apps.

I cancelled a payment a week or two in advance but the payment was still deducted. I received a confirmation that the payment was cancelled. This is unacceptable. The home screen has no visible indication of how to see menu needed. I have to begin touching items listed to determine what is a link to additional details and what isn't. Why is it so difficult to just add the three ellipses like all other apps listing menu of tasks!?

I've had this app for years. Never had any problems until now. I haven't been able to get into so for days. And when I get into the app it's a blank white screen. Signing in had been a problem lately. I have to restart my phone. Go to settings and force stop the app. Not convenient, and very time consuming. You'll be lucky if you can even get into the app. It was doing great. Don't what they changed to create all these problems people are having now.

I've been with Capital One for 30 yrs without issue until recently. Now I will be moving all my money & bills b/c they changed the mobile app so that you 1) can't see any upcoming transactions. This makes it more likely to overdraft your acct since you can't plan. 2) you can't make adjustments to pending bill pmts. These two things are a must for me. Capital One suggests that customers use the website instead. No! That's not secure, which is why I only use the app when using my phone.

A single * seems to be how to draw attention to a problem, regardless of several fine features. Since the recent update, the app says that I had updated my finger print & to login using my password. Now happens with every login. Same finger print, still works for other apps. Fix this and then the app will receive a much higher rating. Another user has reported this problem with a pattern login.

Was a great app for many years. I use it as a way to check balances and see if transactions have cleared. I want a "read only" of my account and this app USED to be that. Seems like they are now making it a "full feature banking app". Iin the last month or so they took away the swipe unlock which WAS my preference for accessing the application. Since then the password login has failed repeatedly. And the fix is to reinstall the app. Very frustrating.

Update: Latest version won't let me access my Virtual Cards :/ Balance and available credit take FOREVER to update (always "pending") and provide me with real time info on what's been paid off and/or how much I can purchase with my credit card at the moment. On top of that, UI is in desperate need of a Dark Mode and he chatbot is an absolute joke. Capital One also needs to let me HIDE certain accounts I'd rather not let curious eyes see on the main page of the App. Much room for improvement!

I don't like the direction of the changes on the app. I can't swipe between my accounts anymore. I can't check CDc rates in the app. I liked how it was. It was more functional and intuitive. Now it's blocky and segregated. I'd like being able to open up one account look at some transactions then swipe to look at the next. Now I have to go back, scroll down and remember where I left off. It worked. Now it feels like you're going to sell off something by making it less integrated.

Must have a bug as the preview screen isn't working and you're forced to log in every time as you keep getting an error that you didn't log out properly which isn't true. Just fix the preview screen. 3 months later and the app still tells me I haven't logged in for a while and I can't view the "preview" screen and have to log in completely. And I've uninstalled then reinstalled. It worked for like a week and then back to this foolishness. Changing my stars from 3 to 2 now 1. Fix this please.

I had this app for a long time but then it stopped working. so I deleted it and reinstall. I had to call and get help to change password but it still don't work. I can not log on to the app on my phone but I can on my laptop. So please fix the problem. I pay my bills through the app. I did the update and now it works fine thank you. Since my last update their has been no problems with this app at all. The features are all ery useful. Capitol One has done an excellent job on maintaining the ap
data.replyText: Thanks for your review, Randy. We recommend updating your app to the latest version, 5.49.3, and seeing if that helps. If not, give out tech support team a call at 866-750-0873 and we can assist further from there.

data.text: Had a weird experience wth the balance transfer on the app, and without me entering my credit card #, it seems to have connected to my checking account incorrectly. However, I called customer care and spoke to Cheyenne, and she was able to follow what my issue is, and was able to solve the problem immediately! She was absolutely amazing!

I've been a customer for many years. Overall, I've been pleased. However, for the last several months almost every time I open the app I get spammed with pop ups to install Capital One Shopping app. I decline it every time and yet it always comes back the next time. Also, there doesn't seem to be a way to turn it off. It's this kind of business that turns me off and may make me take all my business to another bank.

I was having a lot of trouble navigating through the system, not that it's difficult but because I am not really good at navigating through the different programs etc. I was having problems with my auto pay and couldn't figure out what to do, but one of the Reps stayed on the phone with me forever to help me get everything put together . I was so greatfull for his kindness and for showing me how easy to move through the Capital One Program.

Most of the time the app works great and is very easy to use. The latest update caused the "Accounts at a Glance" account preview to stop working and made me fully sign in every time. Customer service said if there wasn't another update yet, uninstall and reinstall. Once set up again, it works perfectly again. UPDATE- Accounts at a Glance is not even an option to be turned on in the app for over a month. The updates added other computer generated chat, but nothing useful or a reply from a person

The app tracks your credit score very efficiently and keeps up with your cash back/ travel miles very well. However it fails with the auto pay function. It doesn't make the payment even if you have it set up with a specific date, effectively misses the payment and leaves a balance for the month

Very easy and convenient. I've done this several times and feel secure about the transaction. I'm not sure if this option is no longer available but I used to 'pattern swipe' for access & now, no matter what I do, it is no longer available. Why? I DONT want to finger print or face recognition for sign in....

Used to be decent. Now it is the worst app ever, and they won't fix the glitch. I have seen multiple people have the same issues of it constantly opening while doing something else on your phone. I have written into support. I have tried reinstalling. It almost seems like it is getting worse and popping up more and more. I'm to the point of deleting the app and no longer using Capitol One it's that bad.

All of a sudden, the app won't stop opening on its own. It interrupts whatever you are doing, like playing games or watching videos. Then, when you close it and try to resume other activities, and it does it again. Over and over, just opening for no reason. I uninstalled it and started over, but it still keeps happening. It used to be a great app.

UPDATE: Don't waste your time. The app crashes constantly, push notifications are not helpful, and the damn thing doesn't allow you to pay your bill until *5 days later*, thus incurring a late fee every month (it says the payment is scheduled for Day A, but doesn't withdraw from bank until Day E). Very frustrating and not worth the time or the loss of sanity, IMO.

Good app, very informative. For some reason I really like this bank. I cannot say the same about their customer Service, they are very strict sometimes and have weird policies when resolving a situation with your account. Took one star because you cannot see the balance on each transaction in the credit cards, only on the checking and savings... Not good

App is easy to use once you figure out where to navigate to find what you're looking for, but I miss not having the pattern trace login anymore. I don't like biometrics they don't work well if screens are smudged or scarred in any way. Also too much product advertisements on main screen.

Too many pop-ups trying to sell me a checking account, etc, that I don't even read them any longer. I could miss something important that I need to know if it is popped up in the same place and muscle memory has me automatically click to close so I can get on with the reason I opened the app in the first ppace.
